channel.title: Project Salvation ☣ New RSPS ☣ 718/724 ☣ Have a Look
channel.description:
[center]Introduction:[/center]
Project Salvation is a new runescape private server. with some awsome features. everyone is welcome to join our community and come and play. we still need to fix a few things but you still can come and have a look we also have a problem te ports arnt open thats why the client is current running with hamachi..that just temporary until we get a webclient.
[SPOILER=Features]
[COLOR="#00FF00"]..:Miscellaneous:..[/COLOR] [center]Achievement Diaries:[/center]
Elite. Advanced. Beginner.
Clue Scrolls:
• Digging coordinates. • Equipment often required. • Rewards.
[center]Pets:[/center]
Cute Little jad Cats. Growing.
[center][b]TokenSystem[/b][/center] • How to get Tokens? you can earn tokens with pking or you can get tokens with voting. what can you do with the tokens? you can buy fancy stuff at PvpStore.
[center][b]Bank[/b][/center] Everyting is secure you can also setup up a bankpin :)
[center][b]Bosses:[/b][/center]
• Godwars. • King Black Dragon. • Dagannoth Kings. • Chaos Elemental. • Kalphite Queen. • Barrelchest. • Queen Dragon
[center][b]Minigames[/b][/center]
• Barrows. • Pest Control. • Fight Caves. • Fight Pits. you can also get tokhaar-kal.
[b]Other[/b] donatorzone staffzone Active Working PKing areas Great Economy Dicing(without any problems) (you will figure out if you play) Webclient ( in the making) 24/7 Forums.
[center][b]Media:[/b][/center] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/33eq0xy.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/30szynr.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2w66h7d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/30bzsau.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/eiw6eq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2u95nh1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/dzecy.jpg[/img]

@HyperionPro wrote:

[center]Introduction:[/center]

Project Salvation is a new runescape private server.
with some awsome features.
everyone is welcome to join our community and come and play.
we still need to fix a few things but you still can come and have a look
we also have a problem te ports arnt open thats why the client is current running
with hamachi…that just temporary until we get a webclient.
